author: Christophe Giraud and Tony Martinez and Christophe G. Giraud-Carrier
title: University of Bristol Department of Computer Science ILA: Combining Inductive Learning with Prior Knowledge and Reasoning

This allows ILA to perform well, even with simple (and possibly weak) generalization mechanisms (see for example the soybean small dataset in Section 3).
